item.title: Disable editing of specific financial dimensions on form
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Control financial dimension editing in Dynamics 365 Finance forms using X++ and DimensionEntryControl. Learn how to programmatically disable specific dimensions while keeping others editable.
